pullRequest.title: Cleanup of CLI event stream agent
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Auto reformatted code. Cleaned up handling of invalid recipes so that we throw the error back to the user immediately instead of later failing the deployment.
Why is this change necessary:
How was this change tested:
Any additional information or context required to review the change:
